Author: Cautious-Highway
Text: Man, that sounds rough. Wishing you a speedy recovery

Author: lotuslungs
Text: I’m sorry. Try to remind yourself that it’s just one week, and that you will be okay. I take 5mg prednisone daily (I’m a double lung transplant patient) and just did a 12 day prednisone taper starting at 40mg. I was afraid I’d get a really puffy face and eat constantly, but it killed my appetite, I didn’t get puffy, and I lost weight (which I wasn’t trying to do).
